name: THE RITUAL (Indie Horror Game)
description:
THE RITUAL is a short horror game with FPS elements produced by indie developer AMRealGames.

Will you survive in a world full of monsters, where your gun and flashlight are your best friends?
Turn off your light..wait for the night..and..PLAY IT!STORYLINEGame is devided into three chapters which take place on a different handcrafted maps.The story is not the most important thing here..
Let's be honest..you want to be scared..
be prepared and save your ammo!WHAT TO EXPECT?This is not an AAA game, the graphics is outdated, the story is weak as hell...
But if you like retro games packed with monsters and jumpscares..this game is definitely for you!



I'm Just An Independent Game Developer..
Don't be too hard for me ok?
It's my first game, the next one will be better..I promise!
Have fun!
